title: How TO - Notes

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Notes with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to create "notes" with CSS. Notes Notes can be used to notify the user about something special: danger, success, information or warning Danger! Some text... Success! Some text... Info! Some text... Warning! Some text... How To Create Notes Step 1) Add HTML: Example

Danger! Some text...

Step 2) Add CSS: Example .danger { background-color: #ffdddd; border-left: 6px solid #f44336; } Tip: Also check out Alerts . ★ +1
